title: PBE problems
body:
This is what happens http://prntscr.com/d2rjbc when I click on this link http://prntscr.com/d2rjvo
However, I play on EUNE and as I saw it's available on this region. I would like to know what's wrong. 
I have lvl 30 and everything, I cleared my cookies and cache and it still didn't help me at all...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Based on these screenshots, it seems like you are attempting to sign up through the NA region URL, but need to use the one for EUNE.  As a first step, log out completely.  Then, you'll need to sign in from the [EUNE ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com)page first, then visit the [EUNE PBE](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) link. 

So, log out first then head over to the EUNE page. Once there, the EUNE PBE link should get this resolved. Hope that helps!
